title: Understanding the Risks of Gambling
description: This chapter explores the mathematics behind gambling, including probability concepts, the house edge, and expected value calculations, helping students evaluate gambling activities and understand their potential financial consequences.
learning_objectives: Understand and calculate probability in various gambling scenarios
Distinguish between independent and dependent events in gambling activities
Explain the concept of house edge and how it ensures profits for gambling organizers
Calculate expected value to determine potential financial outcomes of gambling
Recognize the gambler's fallacy and other common misconceptions about gambling

skill_builder.title: Viewing Gambling as a Form of Entertainment
skill_builder.description: An interactive activity where students analyze different types of gambling activities as forms of entertainment rather than methods to make money, evaluating their costs and potential consequences.
